subject: Alternative to repeating @ContextConfiguration

messageBody:
I am using JUnit 4 annotations to run my tests.

@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
@ContextConfiguration(locations = "file:src/test/resources/test-applicationContext.xml")

It's not very DRY to have to copy @ContextConfiguration into every test. Other than going back to JUnit 3 and extending TestCase again is their another option to constantly repeating
@ContextConfiguration(locations = "file:src/test/resources/test-applicationContext.xml")?
